body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support team. My name is Billy Lewis and I'm representing XYZ Company. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Heather. Could you provide me with your date of birth for identification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's the seventh of August, nineteen ninety-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also confirm the last four digits of your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's nine five six two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for verifying that information, Heather. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that'll be all. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Heather. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to contact us. Have a wonderful day!
